---
category: news
title: "In the clamour for an Indigenous voice, true suffering is being drowned out"
excerpt: "It is hard to hear the softest of voices in a room filled with clamouring chatter. Only in silence can the quiet truly be heard. Thus, the genuine voices of Indigenous suffering are being drowned out by the virtue-signalling calls for a voice and recognition."
